actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to offer to enter into a Vehicle Fuel Efficiency Research Agreement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Energy to offer to enter into a cooperative research and development (R and D) agreement (known as the Vehicle Fuel Efficiency Research Agreement) with representatives of U.S. motor vehicle manufacturers to provide for R and D of technology to enhance the fuel efficiency of passenger vehicles or light trucks. Sets the Federal share of the costs incurred under such agreement at 50 percent. Requires the Secretary to submit annual progress reports to the Congress. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to offer to enter into a Vehicle Fuel Efficiency Research Agreement, and for other purposes.
